text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/03a9f848175b182372fb33403998059724a8bf31|patch 8.2.0747: cannot forcefully close all popups>
patch 8.2.0747: cannot forcefully close all popups

Problem:    Cannot forcefully close all popups.
Solution:   Add the "force" argument to popup_clear().  Use it after running a
            test.  Put back the check for a popup when editing a file.

attachments.text: Problem: Cannot forcefully close all popups. Solution: Add the &quot;force&quot; argument to popup_clear(). Use it after running a test. Put back the check for a popup when editi...

patch 8.2.0748: cannot get a list of all popups

Problem:    Cannot get a list of all popups.
Solution:   Add popup_list().  Use it in the test runner.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5aed0ccb965dbad4b60f4c77c9c4455a9379e73c|patch 8.2.0743: can move to another buffer from a terminal in popup w…>
patch 8.2.0743: can move to another buffer from a terminal in popup window

Problem:    Can move to another buffer from a terminal in popup window.
Solution:   Do not allow "gf" or editing a file. (closes #6072)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9e6ba8cbef2b2363f1d0a0e2c2a8d21c3b987416|patch 8.2.0744: the name vim is not capatilized in a message>
patch 8.2.0744: the name vim is not capatilized in a message

Problem:    The name vim is not capatilized in a message.
Solution:   Use "Vim" instead of "vim".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/06f0853cb0b10364b22e5607fdecd35b3936e9ea|patch 8.2.0745: crash on exit when not all popups are closed>
patch 8.2.0745: crash on exit when not all popups are closed

Problem:    Crash on exit when not all popups are closed.
Solution:   Close popups when freeing all memory.  Disable checking for popup
            when editing a file for now.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0745: crash on exit when not all popups are closed · vim/vim@06f0853
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0745: crash on exit when not all popups are closed · vim/vim@06f0853
attachments.text: Problem: Crash on exit when not all popups are closed. Solution: Close popups when freeing all memory. Disable checking for popup when editing a file for now.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d502aa4c10771ec8eb570345ec5e124c4a4b7cd0|patch 8.2.0746: popup_clear() hangs when a popup can't be closed>
patch 8.2.0746: popup_clear() hangs when a popup can't be closed

Problem:    popup_clear() hangs when a popup can't be closed.
Solution:   Bail out when a popup can't be closed.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0746: popup_clear() hangs when a popup can't be closed · vim/vim@d502aa4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0746: popup_clear() hangs when a popup can't be closed · vim/vim@d502aa4
attachments.text: Problem: popup_clear() hangs when a popup can't be closed. Solution: Bail out when a popup can't be closed.
